contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Unfortunately the existing field for the TaskData (ScheduledTaskConfigurationData) is not editable in the admin UI. Kentico support cannot tell me if and when this will become available.\ \ Since we have been using this field since k4.1, we kinda miss this right now. \ \ I wonder if there is some workaround to get it editable, so users/administators are able to change settings we have in this field, like notifyEmail or retryCount etc.
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.1.1] * .NET version: \[9] * Execution environment: \[Private cloud (Azure)
